alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange; Osceola; Seminole; Southern Lake County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 16 at 7:39AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of Seminole, Lake, Orange, Volusia and northwestern Osceola Counties through 830 AM EST... At 736 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong showers thunderstorms along a line extending from near Leesburg to near the Green Swamp. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Deltona, Daytona Beach, Kissimmee and Port Orange. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Conditions are favorable for the development of funnel clouds. If a funnel cloud is spotted move indoors and report your sighting to the National Weather Service. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Volusia; Inland Volusia; Northern Lake County; Orange; Osceola; Seminole; Southern Lake County
